document_data.name: Thael Leaf
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2024-1-6 - Andred Kuroone, Lurandural Veltree, Jhalanavress Tanthavur, and Orstrar Galannavruk}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thael leaf''' was a dried plant substance used as an additive to flavor [[pipeweed]] and enhance the scent of temple [[incense]].
document_data.Description: Thael leaf were dried leaves that added pleasant taste and scent when burned along with incenses or pipeweed. The fragrant smoke resembled that of [[almond]]s, roasted nuts, and [[herb]]s, notably lacking sweetness.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Andred Kuroone]], a merchant from [[Zazesspur]] who dealt in Thael leaf, spices, and dried goods in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
